actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to allow larger acreages of certain land to be retained by the owner of such land and to remain qualified for irrigation water under the Federal reclamation laws.

summary.text: Allows larger acreages of specified land to be retained by the owner of such land and still remain qualified for irrigation water under the Federal reclamation laws. Redefines the term "irrigable acres" for purposes of eligibility for such irrigation water.

titles.title: A bill to allow larger acreages of certain land to be retained by the owner of such land and to remain qualified for irrigation water under the Federal reclamation laws.
